data.prayer: Spirit, make the church in Nordjylland, Denmark humble and willing to hear the sometimes hard voices of prophets bringing the light of truth on them.
data.verse: So have I become your enemy by telling you the truth?

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Nordjylland, Denmark
data.section_summary: What challenges do people here face?

data.prayer: Father, help 116 new simple churches start among the 580,300 people in the state of Nordjylland, Denmark. One within reach of everyone living here.
data.verse: For the earth will be filled with the knowledge of the glory of the Lord as the waters cover the sea.

data.prayer: Lord, please make the same Spirit that raised Jesus from the dead give life to those who are called by his name in the state of Nordjylland.
data.verse: But if the Spirit of him who raised up Jesus from the dead dwells in you, he who raised up Christ Jesus from the dead will also give life to your mortal bodies through his Spirit who dwells in you.

data.prayer: Father, please, raise up a generation of disciples in the state of Nordjylland who will make disciples who make disciples.

Jesus, all authority was given to you, and you commanded all disciples in Nordjylland, Denmark to make more disciples, and you promised to be with them. May your power and their obedience make more disciples today.
data.verse: All authority in heaven and on earth has been given to me. Therefore go and make disciples of all nations, baptizing them in the name of the Father and of the Son and of the Holy Spirit, and teaching them to obey everything I have commanded you. And surely I am with you always, to the very end of the age.

data.prayer: Father, please send new apostles into the harvest, who can open up new communities for the gospel in the state of Nordjylland, Denmark.
data.verse: Ask the Lord of the harvest, therefore, to send out workers into his harvest field.

data.section_summary:
the state of Nordjylland, Denmark has a population of 580,300.

We estimate Nordjylland has 20,985 people who might know Jesus, 452,270 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 107,045 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 27 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Spirit, awaken the sleepers and call them to repent and be baptized in the state of Nordjylland. Set an urgency in their hearts.
data.verse: And now why do you wait? Rise and be baptized and wash away your sins, calling on his name.’
